[b][color=white]Premium Sellers Section Prestige Requirement Introduced[/color][/b]
Members will now need a minimum of five prestige in order to post in the Premium Sellers Section. According to [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url], this change in site policy is to deter sellers from making multiple accounts in order to bump the threads of their products over the competition.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5758850] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1320406][img]https://i.imgur.com/SiKAZ8H.png[/img][/url][/align]

[list][*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3323508][color=#000000][b]00100100[/b][/color][/url] was banned for unnecessary flaming in multiple threads.

[b][color=white]Group Changes[/color][/b]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2041579][color=#0066FF][b]'Fox[/b][/color][/url] is no longer the owner of Aurora, Consensus, and Polyzen.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=12145][color=#0066FF][b]Lexsern[/b][/color][/url] is no longer a leader of Aurora.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=509788][color=#0066FF][b]Makaveli The Don[/b][/color][/url], [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=659087][color=#FFFFFF][b]Kill Joy[/b][/color][/url], and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1729678][color=#FFFFFF][b]ScreemS[/b][/color][/url] are no longer leaders of Consensus.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][color=#0066FF][b]iHydra[/b][/color][/url] is no longer a leader of Polyzen.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=275104][color=#0066FF][b]ra1d[/b][/color][/url] is no longer the owner of Transcendence.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3687455][color=#FFCC00][b]Dr. Scuffed[/b][/color][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2287994][color=#FFFFFF][b]TopKekeroni[/b][/color][/url] are no longer leaders of Transcendence.
[*]Aurora has been rebranded to Divined.
[*]Consensus has been rebranded to C$sh.
[*]Eclipse has been rebranded to Heroes.
[*]Polyzen has been rebranded to SheepGang.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1407964][color=#FFFFFF][b]KɪɴG[/b][/color][/url] is now the owner of Transcendence.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2414597][color=#0066FF][b]c$sh[/b][/color][/url] is now the owner of C$sh.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2414597][color=#0066FF][b]c$sh[/b][/color][/url] is now a leader of Divined and SheepGang.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2292899][color=#FFFFFF][b]Divined[/b][/color][/url] is now the owner of SheepGang and Divined.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2292899][color=#FFFFFF][b]Divined[/b][/color][/url] is now a leader of C$sh.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2941702][color=#FFFFFF][b]Stashyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy[/b][/color][/url] is now a leader of SheepGang.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=692131][color=#0066FF][b]Tsundere[/b][/color][/url] and [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1618863][color=#FFFFFF][b]Japanese[/b][/color][/url] are now leaders of Heroes.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5758850][color=#FFFFFF]PSS Prestige Requirement[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
There is now a prestige requirement for posting in the Premium Sellers Section.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5759147][color=#FFFFFF]BTC Fees and HF Credits[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient is discusses the idea of implementing a credits system.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5758863][color=#FFFFFF]Question for Sellers[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
